short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus Nazar is a simple, lightweight Chrome Extension designed to manage your focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost Your Productivity with Focus Nazar - Your Ultimate Chrome Extension for Enhanced Focus!

Are distractions constantly pulling you away from your work? Enter Focus Nazar, the sleek and efficient Chrome Extension built to supercharge your concentration.

🚀 Key Features:
🎯 Focus Management: Regain control of your focus by curbing distracting services.
⏰ Time Limitation: Set daily intake limits for your most distracting websites.
🚫 Blocker Mode: Take it up a notch and block them altogether.
🌐 Predefined Domains: Swiftly add popular service domains.
✨ Custom Domains: Tailor Focus Nazar to your unique needs.

Say goodbye to distractions and hello to enhanced productivity. Install Focus Nazar now!
